title: Senior Backend Developer (Ruby on Rails)
description:
## About the Role

Shopify is looking for a Senior Backend Developer to join our team. You will be responsible for building and maintaining the scalable, high-performance services that power the world's largest e-commerce platform.

### Responsibilities:

* Design, build, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable Ruby code.
* Identify bottlenecks and bugs, and devise solutions to these problems.
* Help maintain code quality, organization, and automatization.
* Contribute to a high-performance, distributed systems environment.

### Qualifications:

* 5+ years of professional software development experience.
* Strong experience with Ruby on Rails.
* Experience with relational databases (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL) and key-value stores (e.g., Redis).
* A passion for building high-quality, scalable software.

title: Data Scientist, AI & Machine Learning
description:
## About the Role

Join Borealis AI, RBC's AI research and development lab. We're looking for a Data Scientist to help us build the next generation of financial products and services using cutting-edge machine learning techniques.

### Responsibilities:

* Develop and deploy machine learning models to solve complex business problems.
* Work with large, complex datasets to extract valuable insights.
* Collaborate with engineers, product managers, and business stakeholders.
* Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in AI and machine learning.

### Qualifications:

* MSc or PhD in Computer Science, Statistics, or a related quantitative field.
* Proven experience building and deploying machine learning models (Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch).
* Strong programming skills and experience with data manipulation (SQL, Pandas).
* Excellent communication and problem-solving skills.

title: Frontend Developer (React)
description:
## About the Role

Lululemon is seeking a passionate Frontend Developer to create exceptional digital experiences for our guests. You will be a key member of our e-commerce technology team, focusing on building beautiful, high-performance, and accessible user interfaces.

### Responsibilities:

* Develop new user-facing features using React.js.
* Build reusable components and front-end libraries for future use.
* Optimize components for maximum performance across a vast array of web-capable devices and browsers.
* Collaborate with product designers and backend engineers to translate designs into high-quality code.

### Qualifications:

* 3+ years of experience with modern JavaScript (ES6+) and React.
* Strong understanding of HTML5, CSS3, and responsive design principles.
* Experience with state management libraries (e.g., Redux, Zustand).
* Familiarity with testing frameworks like Jest or React Testing Library.

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
## About the Role

We are looking for a DevOps Engineer to help automate and streamline our operations and processes. You will be part of a team responsible for the CI/CD pipeline, infrastructure orchestration, and monitoring of our critical systems.

### Responsibilities:

* Build and maintain CI/CD pipelines to automate software delivery.
* Manage and scale our cloud infrastructure (AWS/Azure).
* Implement and manage monitoring and alerting systems (Prometheus, Grafana, Datadog).
* Work closely with development teams to promote DevOps best practices.

### Qualifications:

* Experience with CI/CD tools (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab CI, CircleCI).
* Strong knowledge of containerization and orchestration (Docker, Kubernetes).
* Experience with Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools like Terraform or Ansible.
* Proficiency in scripting languages (e.g., Python, Bash).

title: Associate Product Manager
description:
## About the Role

This is an exciting opportunity for an aspiring Product Manager to join our digital banking team. You will work with a cross-functional team to define, build, and launch new features that deliver value to our customers.

### Responsibilities:

* Support the product lifecycle from concept to launch.
* Gather and prioritize product and customer requirements.
* Write clear user stories and acceptance criteria.
* Analyze data and user feedback to inform product decisions.

### Qualifications:

* 1-2 years of experience in product management, business analysis, or a related role.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
* Excellent communication skills and ability to work in a team environment.
* A passion for technology and building great customer experiences.
